title: What is the greatest promise of technology for teaching and learning? - Quora

response.answer_text: Technology is changing the way students learn but also the way professors teach! And this is great news, not a bad one. Times are changing and technology is now everywhere. Putting this reality to the good of education is a must and the benefits from it are real! Technology can bring many benefits to education such as using these mobile devices that usually distract your students in class, to a better good. This can be done by improving participation and interaction with your audience. One great benefit is for instance, the fact that technology enables very effective audience response systems in classrooms. Audience response systems are a great way of increasing the level of participation and interaction with your audience and students tend to enjoy the class more and remember the content better. Wooclap is an awesome and easy tool for that. It’s a great interactive tool used on all devices; smartphones, tablets and computers. All you need is the link to the website and you can turn presentations, classes, meetings into a great interactive experience. It is a good way to change the rhythm of classes by transferring part of the learning directly to your participants. This allows great interaction, collaboration and more engagement from your classroom. Go check the website : https://www.wooclap.com/en/. Check out Wooclap’s twitter account: wooclap (@wooclap) | Twitter for more info on the benefits of technology in education!

Teaching with technology can enhance the learner learning experience. Technology plays a very important role to enhance the learner experience. But it can be challenging to identify the best tech tools to meet the teaching objective. There are so many EDTech who are taking the initiative to meet the emerging technology requirement of education. WizIQ is one of the know EDTech startup who are taking the initiative to reform the level of education using e-learning platform. WizIQ is providing world class features like online course builder, test and assessment, mobile learning, online classroom software, and e-learning analytics to empower the level of education.  How can technology help you? 1. Easy to access – student and learner can easily access the courses online. 2. Improved communication – E-learning platform helps learner and instructor to share the document in real time. Whiteboard, chat and live poll help instructor to make effective communication. 3. Accelerate the literacy rate – Technology plays a very important role in improving the literacy rate. As it supports distance learning experience that lets learner access the courses from anywhere at any time. 4. Easy to organize test online – Instructor can organize different types of online test and make it mandatory for every learner. The learner can access it from anywhere at any time. 5. Save time and money – Technology saves time and money both. To have a successful online session, you don’t need a physical classroom. Simply from the technology you can organize the virtual classroom and save money. Most of the school, colleges and universities are using the SaaS e-learning platform to provide more accurate and better education.

When teaching online a teacher is free to experiment by applying different learning techniques such as blended learning, flipped learning, social learning, rapid learning, storytelling, microlearning etc. Thereby they can decide on the technique to make learning as engaging and effective as possible. Schools are struggling to meet the needs of a wide range of skill levels in a single classroom. Using digital curriculum, adaptive software, and other online resources combined with diverse learning models provides an avenue to shift our traditional teacher-centered classrooms to student-centered classrooms. There are millions of examples how technology teachers individually to the students, personalizes learning, deepens instructions, broadens instructions. One thing that technology does not do though, is a promise that any of those changes will be a benefit to the student. This still falls on the shoulders of the teacher. Technology offers the potential to change things for the good, but the teachers have to see the potential in order to do the things that are impactful.

With the help of technology in education I believe teachers’ life is easier. Lots of variety of technological educational websites, applications, tools, devices provide teachers to prepare themselves for teaching in class and also outside of the classroom. Lesson planning, generating worksheets, tests, exams, classroom activities take now less time with the help of technology. Teachers do not have to be very active and get exhausted before the class time and during the class time anymore. Not only during teaching also in the assessment pace. The students are more active than previous times in an technology enhanced environment. They are more curios to learn, interact with peers, get self- confidence and responsibility while performing the task in class. One another promise of technology for the students it makes learning fun! Students are ore motivated and excited while learning with the help of technology compare to teacher centered classroom.
